topic.title: MAW GWT: Transport Model Time Steps

para.text: MAW GWT: Transport Model Time Steps
In the transport model, the number of time steps in the stress period is increased to 20. Select "Model|MODFLOW Time" and on the GWT tab, set the number of time steps to 20.

image.title: Screen capture of the MODFLOW Time dialog box showing the number of time steps in the transport model.
image.caption: Screen capture of the MODFLOW Time dialog box showing the number of time steps in the transport model.
